text: is a Japanese cross-country skier. She competed in five events at the 1998 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Japan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Niigata Prefecture Category:Asian Games medalists in cross-country skiing Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1999 Asian Winter Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1999 Asian Winter Games
title: Kumiko Yokoyama
